metadata.title: CVE-2020-14322 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Moodle before 3.9.1, 3.8.4, 3.7.7 and 3.5.13, yui_combo needed to limitthe amount of files it can load to help mitigate the risk of denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
